code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import QuoteForm from"../components/quote";import backendURL from"../components/config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OneIndustriePage=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[industries,setIndustries]=useState(null);const[showQuoteForm,setShowQuoteForm]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const fetchIndustries=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(backendURL,"/api/industries/").concat(id));setIndustries(response.data);};fetchIndustries();},[id]);if(!industries)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"one-service-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:industries.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:industries.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setShowQuoteForm(!showQuoteForm),className:"quote-btn",children:"Get a Quote"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"service-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:industries.image_url,alt:industries.name})})]}),showQuoteForm&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"quote-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuoteForm,{})})]});};export default OneIndustriePage;
